slide.title: PEAR::XML_Tree
slide.blurb: With PEAR's XML_Tree you can parse as well as create new XML documents. In the example in this slide we will use the file "%sdphp_talk2.xml%".
First we need to install it using the pear installer:
slide.example:
$ pear install XML_Tree ... install ok
$ pear list Installed packages: =================== +-------------------+----------+--------+ | Package | Version | State | ... | XML_Tree | 1.1 | stable | ...
